titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Hidesaburo Hanafusa papers, Rockefeller University Faculty FA1112

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2015-08-10 14:49:58 -0400.

did.unittitle: Hidesaburo Hanafusa papers, Rockefeller University Faculty

processinfo.head: Processing Information note
processinfo.p: Level 1 Minimal Processing has been conducted to establish basic intellectual and physical control of the material and assess immediate preservation and conservation needs. Material remains as received, in original folders and storage boxes.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation note
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access note
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open for scholarly research.

RAC is unable to provide access to obsolete media. When feasible, a digital surrogate may be created via special order. All applicable charges will apply. See RAC Head of Archival Services or RAC Head of Digital Programs for details.

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements note
phystech.p: Materials requiring specialized equipment for access (film, audio, video, slides) may be restricted from scholarly research dependent on availability of the applicable equipment.
Brittle or damaged items, or materials otherwise in need of preservation care, may be restricted from scholarly research at the discretion of the RAC Head of Archival Services/RAC Head of Reference.

did.unittitle: The Darwin Lectures, "Cellular Genes and Oncogenesis". Three Lectures by Hidesaburo Hanafusa.
did.physdesc:
Multiple copies of lectures, including those with handwritten revisions.
One bound volume, and several unbound copies.
